body:
Comment 1: 
godoc doesn't look at $GOOS at the moment. When running for local use, it makes sense to
consider GOOS, but in general, the OS which is running godoc may not be the same as the
one for which one is looking at documentation.

A more general solution may require a menu of sorts to choose from.
_Owner changed to @griesemer._ _Status changed to **Thinking**._
